oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Metabolic Health
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Martin, R.
Kressel, U.
Mansfeld, R.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Veterinary Herd Controlling System
performance comparison
process-quality
product-related
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Veterinary Herd Controlling System (VHCSystem), introduced by MANSFELD et al. (2002), is a pyramidal, dynamic quality assurance system for dairy herds. It allows optimization of process-quality and product-related quality. Individual farm goals are pursued through farm specific strategies and target to performance comparison.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2007; 305
